name: vissekom
description:
Your own digital fish bowl aquarium! It is a tiny passive game, place it somewhere on a cozy place on your screen while working or relaxing, and see your cute aquarium get more fun over time 🤩

Features
  • Cute fish 🐟
  • Receive nice presents every now and then 🎁
  • Cool and goofy sound effects 🤪


Sokpop makes a new game every month!
Subscribe for 3$ per month at http://sokpop.co
